Package Server

Class DBConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.DBConnector

  • public class DBConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides data fields and methods to access a database , representing a DB in a Learning Platform Java application. The overall purpose of this class is to store information and retrive it from the data base using prepared statements and queries or updates.
    Since:
    March 5, 2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    A.Benaceur, M.Amouzai
